text: @TomFitton dear tom,--the republican-members remaining[not rino,s]-in either senate/house of horrors--they talk big but produce little.--why??--the masks-only if appropriate n95-can keep one from inhaling/exhaling covid19,-as a law/rule-is only to show power/control-we are walking atm,s
